main event: A civilian observer reported seeing a small, bright light near Laredo, Texas, that resembled a jet but behaved unusually.
interesting points: The observer stated that the light appeared stationary for about 15 minutes before moving rapidly out of sight,No sound was heard during the observation,The observer was unable to make a positive identification of the object,This report is part of the Project Blue Book investigation into UFO sightings,The report includes multiple references to other unidentified sighting reports.
